name: The HELI
description:
"The HELI" is a remake of the game called "Choplifter" by teenage engineering, which was developed exclusively for teenage engineering's "OP-1" synthesizer.

In "The HELI" you play as pink helicopter triyng to complete a pretty straightforward mission - saving the guys.  The problem is that controls are  wacky, so it's not that easy as you think!
